title: EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
description: Summary: Jade Ashton is a sassy virgin. In her private blog, she vents about "fitting in" a world where superficiality reigns supreme.Suddenly all logic flies out the window when she meets Novan: the former geek, who's morphed into a delicious songwriter-musician.They decide to be "friends-with-benefits." But it's Novan--with his poems and riddling passages on his own blog--that backs out.EyeLeash captures self-discovery in the 2000s, and showcases the colorful, intricate drama in two youths' relentless search for themselves--and what's really in their hearts.GENRE: Social Issues (Dating Sex) / Coming of Age / New Media / Popular Culture / 65,000 words===
author: Jess C. Scott
